comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Weldon B. Cooke at third La Air Meet January 19-28 1912  Curtiss- type biplane of his own construction  Roberts 4-X  fifty horse power.
Flew for 18 hours 5 minutes out of possible 22 hours 30 minutes during meet. Won several
of the daily duration prizes.
Aero Club of America Pilot # 95  January 17, 1912
Killed September 6, 1914  Pueblo , Colorado
